main.description: Curious and invested software engineer with a Master's degree in Computer Science and over two years of experience in desktop and mobile applications. Curious and passionate about developing low-level code and optimization, seeking to leverage my skills and experience to deliver innovative and maintainable solutions that exceed customer expectations.
